name: AEROBICS/ZUMBA
description: Energize your mornings and come train and workout with our personal trainers at Mutants Gym. Join our Aerobics Yoga and Zumba lessons and have fun while exercising.

name: ENDURANCE TRAINING
description: Improve your stamina and workout with your friends while listening to trendy tune at one of the hottest gyms in Patna, Mutants.

name: STRENGTH TRAINING
description: Build your strength and get those extra few pounds in before the swimsuit season. Come train under expert personal trainers only at Mutants Gym.

name: WEIGHT LOSS
description: Lose extra weight and get in shape with expert personal trainers and top notch fitness equipments only at Mutants Gym, the best gym in Patna.

name: Fast Track
description: If you strive for real results and want to receive the guidance you need to set yourself up for success, then this is the package for you. you'll be working with me directly and chacking in twice a week. Including full access to my Gym.

name: Bodybuilding
description: If you want an awesome body structure to impress someone or to look dashing good, then this package is for you. in this package you get full access to my gym and are able to train with direct to me. and I also give you a full diet list for you.
